original_text: Ben-Hadad agreed to do what King Asa asked him to do. He sent his army with its leaders to attack towns in Israel. They won the battles at Ijon, Dan, Abel-Beth-Maakah, as well as the region of Kinnereth and the land of Naphtali.
korean_text: 벤하닷이 아사 왕의 말을 듣고 그의 군대 지휘관들을 보내 이스라엘 성읍들을 치되 이욘과 단과 아벨벧마아가와 긴네렛 온 땅과 납달리 온 땅을 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: Ben-Hadad agreed to do what King Asa asked him to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 벤-하닷은 아사 왕이 요청한 것을 하기로 동의했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He sent his army with its leaders
They won the battles at Ijon, Dan, Abel-Beth-Maakah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이욘, 단, 아벨-벳-마아가에서 전투에서 승리했습니다.

sentences.original_text: as well as the region of Kinnereth
